block.p: ARIZONA CARDINALS--Fired Dennis Green, coach. ATLANTA FALCONS--Fired Jim Mora, coach.

ATLANTA THRASHERS--Recalled RW Darren Haydar from Chicago of the AHL. COLUMBUS BLUE JACKETS--Assigned F Joakim Lindstrom to Syracuse of the AHL. RANGERS--Recalled F Jed Ortmeyer from Hartford of the AHL. OTTAWA SENATORS--Recalled RW Jeff Heerema and C Serge Payer from Binghamton of the AHL.
WYOMING--Announced men's senior basketball F Chris Anderson has been declared academically ineligible.
ARIZONA CARDINALS--Fired Dennis Green, coach. ATLANTA FALCONS--Fired Jim Mora, coach.

ATLANTA THRASHERS--Recalled RW Darren Haydar from Chicago of the AHL. COLUMBUS BLUE JACKETS--Assigned F Joakim Lindstrom to Syracuse of the AHL. RANGERS--Recalled F Jed Ortmeyer from Hartford of the AHL. OTTAWA SENATORS--Recalled RW Jeff Heerema and C Serge Payer from Binghamton of the AHL.
WYOMING--Announced men's senior basketball F Chris Anderson has been declared academically ineligible.
